name: Yasai Game
description: This is a physics puzzle game where you stack up vegetables to harvest larger ones. You become a farmer and drop a yasai into the box. When yasais stick together, they evolve into larger yasais. Harvest your cabbage or squash before the box gets too hot.

name: Family Game Mega Pack 14 in 1
description: Welcome to the ultimate gaming experience for the whole family! Introducing the Family Game Mega Pack 14 in 1 – your one-stop solution for endless fun and excitement.

name: Netghost
description: Netghost is a Crime Drama visual novel with a mystery-driven story full of intrigue, twists and turns. The story follows Ian Newfield, a cyber security engineer who transforms into a cold-blooded criminal in his struggle to protect the company he works for and aid his ailing sister.

name: Hunting With Dad
description: Dad needs you to hunt slimes. Do it, he will give you magic powers.

name: Knowledge Keeper
description: In this game, you will become a keeper of knowledge, collecting shards of divine crystals. Look for the right way to crystals. Avoid dangerous obstacles. Teleport from one space to another to get closer to your goal.

name: 0th floor.: The Cursed Elevator To Floor Zero
description: You've been trapped in an elevator that always goes to the 0th floor. Don't overlook any anomalies, and try to move to the designated floors.

name: Route8
description: "You're lost on Route 8. You must find a way to escape. This eerie road is terrifying.""Night falls, the phone rings. Who are you? You find yourself driving along Route 8, repeating endlessly."

name: Sushido
description: Jump, dash, shoot, and slash your way through endless waves of evil sushi ingredients in pursuit of the highest score possible. Do you have what it takes to harmonize all seven abilities and become a true master of SUSHIDO?

name: Godrop
description: One level of warning, cosmic droplet rampage! A roguelike game featuring impact piercing. Collect holy relics, build up your energy, and morph the droplets to invade the solar system and destroy the ignorant human fleet to the ground!

name: 13 Floors: Anomalies
description: You get a strange job. Your job is to patrol a 13th-floor apartment, look for anomalies...

name: Just Dance.exe
description:
Just Dance.exe is a free PC-exclusive fangame made from scratch. With content made by fans like fanmades, mashups, and original maps, with the aim of making their creations playable and reaching more people.

You can play new exclusive game modes, with which you will discover new ways to dance while having fun with your friends.

name: Dishwashing Simulator
description: A unique survival-farming-base-building-tycoon-horror game where you must survive through washing dishes. Explore mysterious depths, manage resources, and unravel a cryptic narrative. In DWS, a chore becomes a journey to freedom.

name: Snowy Flag
description: Snowy Flag is a 3D car game in which an exciting adventure awaits you! You have to drive a van on snowy roads and collect flags! Show dexterity and skill in driving vehicles to successfully overcome all obstacles on your way!

name: Cubus
description: Descend through a series of endless falling cubes in this fast-paced game. Test your reflexes and timing as you navigate through tight spaces and avoid obstacles.

name: Unknown Signal: Invasion
description: Unknown Signal: Invasion is a continuation of the exciting sci-fi game. This time you have to go to the space station to investigate a new mysterious signal coming from an unknown source.

name: Foulbreaker
description: Welcome to the exciting fantasy world where the mix of adrenaline, strategy and magic reaches its peak! "Foulbreaker" is a bagel in the classic sense, where you will have an endless battle with frenzied monsters in a troubled kingdom.

name: The Monarch: First Light
description: Will you be the savior to purify this land? The Monarch is a lane-defense game where you control a monarch, expand your kingdom, and defend against evil by strategically managing gold resources, recruiting diverse units, and exploring a world filled with mythical threats.

name: Hidden Clues 2: Miami
description: The murders are rampant in Miami! Follow the clues to crack the cases and arrest the killers!

name: TileTurn
description: TiltTurn is a game where you need to solve swap-puzzles! Enjoy the tranquility and relaxing moments by solving swap-puzzles with beautiful anime drawings of different styles.

name: Wizard Combat
description: Plunge into Wizard Combat: PvP battles, leveling, customizable wizards, challenging modes, powerful spells, valuable loot – become the ultimate sorcerer in this mystical world!

name: Little Horrors!
description: Little Horrors! is a horror themed pet sim. Raise your new friend right, or it could end up causing complete mayhem!

name: Solar Storm
description: Solar Storm is a classic turn-based artillery shooter. You are a tank pilot, fighting for control over the solar system. Battle your friends in a fully destructible terrain to see who is the best!

name: Dungeon Artifact
description: Dungeon Artifact is a roguelike deck-builder game with authentic card game elements. 200+ cards offer the possibility to create new combos all the time. Build the most powerful deck by your own hands and overwhelm your enemies!

name: Barbarous: Family Secrets
description: Help Emyr save the world in a Time Management game full of adventure and comedy!

name: Seren Nova
description: Seren Nova is a top-down 3D retro sci-fi game set in a solar system at war. Choose the best ship to complete each mission and take out the enemy across various planets. You can even land your ship and take the war to the enemy on foot. Featuring a fun retro sci-fi live-action cutscenes and puppets!

name: M City
description: A crazy and strange town, filled with mysterious events. A hero with multiple personality disorders. Laughter, tears and madness!

name: Reconnoitre
description: Unending nightfall has swept across the forest, sending all the animals fleeing from monstrous shapes in the dark! Collect and use charms and glyphs of power to make your way through the forest, reconnect villages and help towns-critters as you work to solve the cause of the nightfall.

name: Ataraxie
description: Ataraxie, in the pure style of retro games, ties itself with the SNES Gaming era and embrace difficulty, for it wishes to give experienced gamers/players the test they are really looking for!

name: Dave's Fun Algebra Class: Remastered
description: Return to Dave's school in this brand new version of Dave's Fun Algebra Class! Solve math problems, meet Dave's friends, and uncover the secrets of Dave's school.

name: Void Crawler
description: Void Crawler is a horror game set in a dystopian future, where you pilot a vehicle nicknamed 'The Mole' into a mysterious void deep within the Earth to collect an extremely valuable material for a company dedicated to solving the world's energy crisis.

name: Planetiles
description: Planetiles is a serene city-builder about crafting natural habitats on remote planets. Create a space haven, protect it from natural disasters, and evolve your world while completing challenging quests. Craft unique biomes and unlock exciting bonuses and new tile types.

name: Anonymous Hacker Simulator
description: Step into the shoes of a skilled Anonymous hacker and embark on a mission to unveil the truth hidden behind a sinister organization's plans to monitor civilian data and enforce mass surveillance.

name: Spider Fox
description: Spider Fox is a game about a Mad Scientist who has combined all animals throughout the land. You play as a Spider Fox who must now save the animals and stop the Mad Scientist.

name: Azoove
description: Adventure with friends in this co-op card roguelike, bravely crossing the dangerous Azoove desert. Manage resources and communicate effectively to survive the journey and return the cursed book to the Library. Strategize and make it there in time to seal the evil fiend Ur'gan!

name: Strategy Game but With a Penguin Who Has a Sword
description: Fight monsters with your cool tactics in this relaxing strategy rougelite game.

name: GunGuru
description: A game made by a real world US Marine Veteran Machine-gunner. Explore the ever evolving jungle of GunGuru, an ancient procedurally generated environment, full of magic and mystery. Unlock the secret of the Runes and find out what is hidden beneath.

name: Imperial Storm
description: Imperial Storm is a new style card strategy game. Recruit trustworthy followers to counter conspiracy and become a strong power in the court!

name: Auto RiskRisk
description: A strategic 2D equipment-based auto battler. Equip your fighters with different items and artefacts to form a team. Then send them off to fight against AI opponents in single player or against other human players online. By combining certain types of items you can increase your strength or counter the opponents' strategies.

name: Bent Oak Island
description: Bent Oak Island is a 1990's point and click adventure set on a mysterious island! Join twins Archer and Sam as they delve into the mysteries of both the island and their own heritage, and maybe save the world!

name: Fade Memory
description: Investigate and find out the mysterious secret of Ethan's dreams in an atmospheric adventure touching on the theme of loneliness and escapism.

name: Alchemist: The Potion Monger
description: Become the Alchemist not only in your Lab! Open the door of your home, explore, gather ingredients, interact with various characters and sell or use the potions you craft! Design your home and grow plants in the backyard. Be good, bad, or neutral, and write your own alchemical tale!

name: Skaramazuzu
description: Enter the mysterious world of Skaramazuzu, and get ready to be tested. Meet strange beings and whimsical personalities, face challenges, and solve riddles in a hand-drawn, black and white 2D world.

name: Starwisp Hyperdrive
description: A cozy atmospheric exploration game about making your home in space, finding your way in a strange and whimsical universe, and the impact you have along the way.

name: Loathful
description: Loathful is a Survival Horror in first person with PS1 graphics. Bring yourself in a retro-style adventure where all your nightmares are brought to life. Survive your demons, dive into your darkest fears to overthrow a mysterious virus who seems to have put his hands on this universe.

name: No Plan B
description: Carefully plan your team's tactics in close quarters battles. Use the timeline to synchronize each door breach, grenade throw and room entry with precision. Watch your team execute your plan autonomously in epic cinematic replays. Take on challenging roguelike campaigns or standalone missions.

name: Match Villains
description:
A match-3 puzzler starring a trio of rambunctious thieves.

Dive into the exciting world of "Match Villains" and join our unusual family of aristocratic thieves on a thrilling adventure to gather a collection of the world's most precious artifacts.

Break through layers of obstacles with clever matches and unleash powerful combos in a game where every level is a new heist!

name: Lucky Defense
description: A casual tower defense all about LUCK! Summoning units is all based on LUCK! Yes, it's a tower defense game! Defeat the monsters! You can also merge units! You just never know what you'll get!

name: Overwatch 2: PlayStation Plus Mega Bundle
description:
Don't miss out on the free Legendary Beekeeper Sigma, Legendary Art Deco Symmetra, seven Epic Skins, and five Battle Pass Tier Skips. This bundle is available for a limited time for all PlayStation Plus members.

This pack includes:
- Beekeeper Sigma Legendary Skin
- Art Deco Symmetra Legendary Skin
- Runner Sojourn Epic Skin
- Punker Queen Junker Queen Epic Skin
- Construction Ramattra Epic Skin
- Matsuri Kiriko Epic Skin
- Cassia Lifeweaver Epic Skin
- Amethyst Illari Epic Skin
- Rugby Mauga Epic Skin
- 5x Battle Pass Tier Skips

name: Hellfire Rampage VR
description: HELLFIRE RAMPAGE is a thrilling VR adventure where you, as the inventor of teleportation, hunt for crystal essences to unlock a portal to dangerous dungeons. Battle hellish creatures using a vast arsenal of interdimensional weapons. Unique combat mechanics and challenges are awaiting!

name: Nola1
description: This Place is not Pure is Nolatron's first serious attempt at a Quake map.

name: Arkanoid vs. the Occult
description:
Arkanoid is back to fight the evil occult powers in: Arkanoid VS the Occult

Every screen is more or less connected to occult symbolism (or conspiracies). Some of the symbols are quite distorted due to the limitations of blocks per screen
The game now has black blocks (instead of cyan) which do not exist in the original version
The balancing between the stages is a bit wonky, but all stages are completable. Easy mode recommended
Startscreen by Svambo (thx a lot!)
Full 99 level romhack (just the boss stages weren’t edited)

name: The Bird and the Bicycle
description: How far will you go? Take a roadtrip along peaceful country roads, as you fly through an ever changing sky, in this cosy, atmospheric, arcade game, with a retro aesthetic and soundtrack to match.

name: Venom Vendetta
description: Venom Vendetta is a short single tech-base-themed mbf21 map for Doom2. The main focus was to make a map with a small monster count that could be quickly completed.

name: Frowntown
description: So you've decided to become a stand-up comedian?

name: Ski Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Touch Egg
description:
Will you survive the full time? Or will you become All Thumbs?

Finally, the revolutionary and culturally important egg experience comes to Playdate. 60 seconds on the clock, turn that crank and touch that egg! Watch your fingers and don’t let Him see you, his vision is based on movement!

name: BDSM Sex: Episode 4
description: A visual novel series about a young woman exploring the world of BDSM. In this episode, her Master introduces a surprise – a female dominatrix, who will be joining them in their session.

name: Bird Year
description: Bird Year is a gentle, family-friendly arcade game where you're a bird. Feed your hungry babies and avoid the dangers of the forest all year long. Catch bugs, eat berries and dodge predators while using your chosen bird's unique abilities. Unlock bonus content including more birds and a bonus level!

name: MeteoStorm
description: MeteoStorm is an action packed retro shoot-em-up. MeteoStorm offers up to 25 challenging waves of exciting shoot-em-up action with 3 different difficulty levels!

name: Poon Puzzle: Hard Levels DLC
description: 18 more levels of increased difficulty for puzzle lovers

name: Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages DLC
description: There's no such thing as a perfect crime! You have to solve a series of mysterious murders in San Francisco. It turns out that this bright city has its own dark side...

name: Criminal Archives: Murder in the Pages Collector's Edition
description: There's no such thing as a perfect crime! You have to solve a series of mysterious murders in San Francisco. It turns out that this bright city has its own dark side...

name: SnowRunner: The Atom
description: The SnowRunner garage expands once more with the Azov 67096-3N “Atom”! This Heavy-class truck features a modern engine, always-on differential lock and all-wheel drive capability. This DLC is not included in the Year 1, Year 2, Year 3 or Year 4 Pass.

name: Pipeline RTX: 2
description: PIPELINE RTX: 2 is a puzzle game. The goal of the game is incredibly simple: you need to turn various parts of the pipe into certain positions so that in the end the water can, albeit with a large number of convolutions, pass through the water supply.

name: Hurricane
description: This is a reaction type small game with simple operation, and the movement direction keys can control the movement of characters.

name: Riki
description: Help ranger Riki to fight an unknown menace which could destroy not only the Amazon forest but the entire world. A fast and yet challenging game.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Poison Retro Set
description: Poison Retro Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Dark Fire Set
description: Dark Fire Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Critical Strike Set
description: Critical Strike Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: Frost Dive Set
description: Frost Dive Set

name: Pixel Gun 3D: RGB Hero Set
description: RGB Hero Set

name: Daugger
description: A non-combat oriented adventure game about a dog named Olive, exploring, claiming territory, and solving problems to trigger bizarre events. Daugger is a relaxing and casual love letter to pets, suitable for all ages.

name: Cyber Storm Edge 64
description: 64-bits inspired 3D Fast-paced Action Platformer! Collect the disks and unlock new worlds to choose from! Speedrun through past stages to achieve better times and earn gold medals!

name: Device 0101
description: Device0101 is a mystery action adventure that aims to find a key in a mansion, open the door, solve puzzles, and destroy monsters to escape

name: Project Circle
description: This is an action fighting game in which one character explores the map. There are many enemies in the map and you need to defeat them.

name: Caracoles
description: Hilarious like a fart... but longer! In Caracoles you compete against your pals in the fastest outrageously slow racing multiplayer battles ever.

name: True Story Time
description: "True Story Time" - the ultimate party game that guarantees endless laughter and unforgettable moments with friends!

name: Spirit of Death
description: It is a full mode gunfight competitive game, with directional keys to move characters and space keys to jump. With a full 3D perspective, a refreshing shooting style with stunning visual effects, players can enjoy the thrill of gunfights amidst the hustle and bustle of gunfire. This is a brand new challenge, are you willing to be a part of it? Let's take on a challenge together!

name: Search All: Candles
description: Is a hidden object game in which you need to find all the candles in a large location. Candles will be placed in a variety of places, from the most prominent to barely noticeable places

name: You Feel Normal.
description: You find yourself stranded along a lonely, abandoned road, desperately seeking help. You stumble upon an old, farm-themed amusement park, you will feel.

name: Soulscape: Shadows of The Past - Episode 1
description: Soulscape: Shadows of the Past is an immersive and atmospheric adventure game that will take you on a journey into the world of Blake Turner, a former agent grappling with the shadows of his own past. Join us on the adventure through episode 1.

name: Rime's Quest
description: Rime's Quest is an exciting adventure in the world of the Roman Empire, where an ordinary traveler decides to leave his everyday life and go on a dangerous journey. During the game, the player will go on an epic quest full of interesting events, riddles and encounters with numerous enemies.

name: Dwarven Realm
description: Explore an epic fantasy medieval world where dwarves fight for survival in a hostile universe. Guide your colony of dwarves through unique challenges, tough moral choices, and unforgettable encounters. Explore, mine, build, trade to ensure the prosperity of your people.

name: Speedway Challenge 2024
description: Feel speedway emotions thanks to realistic riding physics. Play online mode with friends or local in career mode, league mode, challenges, tournament and quick matches. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: I Commissioned Some Invisible People 0
description: I paid more artists to hide invisible people in 3 pieces of artwork. Can you find them all? Warning: Relaxing.

name: Quad Bike Crazy Driver
description: Get ready for the ultimate adrenaline rush in Quad Bike Crazy Driver, where you'll assume the role of a fearless quad bike rider on a mission for speed and excitement.

name: FolkOrigin
description: Start taking control of the map and build buildings, recruit units, fight monsters and conquer enemy villages. It's a 2D game in which you move on a hexagonal map. A strategy game combined with an RPG game. All in the times of the ancient Slavs. More information soon...

name: Add Astra
description: Add Astra is a math game about racing, and a racing game about math, developed by Coincidence. You’re the best arithmetech racer on Earth. But what about everywhere else?

name: Historical Invaders
description: The most wicked men that ever lived on earth. Authoritarians, dictators, and tyrants, from Hitler to Stalin, they are all back. Historical Invaders it's a fixed shooter game where you are the chosen one to annihilate the demons of our past and save mankind.

name: Magic University
description: Magic University - Welcome to the magical university, where mysterious walls hide incredible opportunities! An exciting adventure awaits you in the world of magic, where every day is filled with new discoveries and challenges.

name: Sequential Dungeon
description: Welcome to Sequential Dungeon, where 64 different levels in 8 uniquely themed floors await you in a simple yet challenging experience! Get ready to clear each of the levels in a limited amount of moves while mastering a varied array of different mechanics!

name: Alone Or Together
description: Two people will work together to clear the stage.

name: Find Cats
description: “A cute game for cat lovers of all ages! There are several maps and the opportunity to look for furry ones that are hiding intelligently!”

name: Lefties' Righteous Arcade Emporium
description: 1 Controller 2 Players 4 games and 16 Modes. Grab a Partner and share your Steam Deck or PC. Defeat your opponent in Tennis, Hockey or Squash. Engage in an old-fashioned Wild West Shoot Out. Race to your Spaceship before the planet explodes. Join forces and save your city from impending destruction.

name: Skybound: Card Survival
description: You're exiled to floating islands by the Gods, forced to entertain them forever. Stripped of your free will, you are cursed to act only through cards. Gather resources, battle monsters and survive the night. Explore the mysterious world and lead your character to triumph.

name: Lost Hope
description: Lost Hope is a multidimensional adventure game where you shape the world, battle zombies, and explore diverse territories, uncovering secrets while facing extreme challenges.

name: Concrete Visions
description: Concrete Visions is a first-person lo-fi art house psychological thriller video game with survival horror and FPS beat’em up elements. There are two main components to the gameplay - melee & lite arms combat and environmental exploration

name: NightFeed
description: Play alone or invite up to 4 friends in this co-op online action rogue survival. A coven of Shadow Hunters perform a nightly feed across the moors, consuming the dead and acquiring their relics. Collecting to provide an even stronger protection against the darkness during the next NightFeed!

name: Slice It Down
description: You will slaughter thousands of enemies, get new abilities and reveal new combo abilities, do not forget to improve your character.

name: Colony Defense
description: Atmospheric unique minimalist tower base defense game. Highly addictive.

name: Eye of the Void: Unleashed
description: The goblin tribes of the realm have united against you and the power of the Eye of the Void. Build towers, fortify walls, construct gold mines to gather resources, and cast powerful spells to fend off waves of determined goblins and their allies who seek to destroy you.

name: From Glory To Goo
description: A sci-fi survival RTS set on an alien world. Establish a colony, explore for resources and customize your spacecraft. But beware, The Goo is ever present and it's coming from every direction, even above and below.

name: The Genesis Order
description: Murder and mystery lead a young detective to investigate a cult and to cross paths with a criminal organization. With the help of an angel and a harem of beauties, take on the challenge of saving the world from a mysterious threat.

name: Pixel Gun 3D: PC Edition
description: Pixel Gun 3D is a near complete PC port of a legendary multiplayer FPS with blocky and colorful graphics. Fight in multiple game modes, unlock dozens of maps and collect more than 1500 unique guns

name: Aexia
description: Aexia is a platform for creating, sharing and playing VR role-playing games. With Aexia, players can role-play as actual actors in a movie set.

name: Kitchen Crisis
description: Kitchen Crisis is a cooking defense game where you play as an abducted Earthling, serving dishes demanded by aliens to survive. Arrange cooking tools efficiently, upgrade ingredients and tools, and adapt to ever-changing recipes to stay alive!

name: Fate Chessboard
description: Fate Chessboard is a Roguelike card game that combines an original turn-based combat system and mine-sweeping elements. In the game, you need to continuously use wisdom and strategy to build your own cards, fight against various powerful enemies. Get ready to embark on your adventure journey!

name: Starborne: Frontiers
description: Take to the stars in an epic space adventure set in the distant future. Discover the dark secrets of the 10 warring factions, from the immortal Children of the Everliving to the lawless Marauders; they all have one goal: to dominate the galaxy. As a commander, you will face threats from all across the galaxy. Is your fleet ready for the challenge? Find out in this stellar tactical gacha game, where you'll test your strategy skills in exhilarating starship battles.

name: The Legend of Skye
description: We will put ourselves in the shoes of a young druid who will be claimed by her tribe to carry out an important mission. After some events in her town, she will have to leave the safety of the forest behind and go explore a world full of dangers. The fate of her grove will be in her hands.

name: Quest Master's Realm
description: Realtime Action Combat MMORPG. Battle Foes and Complete Quests to Level up your Skills and Equipment, ready to face the most Mythic of Enemies. Swap between different Skill Sets whilst playing as the Same Character. Craft and Discover New Items of increasing Rarity.

name: Web3War
description:
Web3War, the multiplayer shooter developed by Roll1ng Thund3rz and incubated by Zilliqa, delivers an exciting and competitive FPS experience that rivals the top shooting games on the market.
The game offers action-packed gameplay, tactical maps, custom load-outs, weapon skins, progression, and many more of the features found in many of the best FPS games.

Web3War also uses blockchain technology to allow players to earn valuable rewards from playing the game. Unlike most other Web3 games,

name: Quit Today
description:
"Quit Today" is a side-scrolling action game around the workplace theme.

One usual day, when you step into the company, all the colleagues attack you because they think you want to resign!

To figure out what happened, you start a fighting trip with your briefcase, and realize the company darkness which you ever ignored is so hateful. You can't keep enduring the high-level's behavior, determined to send the resignation challenge to this company formally!

name: Minishoot' Adventures
description: Minishoot' is a cute and unique adventure game that mixes up open exploration with crispy twin-stick shooter action. Fight your way from the shiny overworld to the deepest caves, improve your ship and overcome the dungeons' bosses to rescue your friends!

name: Of Life and Land
description: Of Life and Land is a charming settlement-building strategy game paired with a rich simulation experience. Every animal and plant tries to find their place in nature while you lead your villagers to their future. Expand to different regions and trade with local factions to gain needed resources.

name: Frogmonster
description: Discover some of the most charming and challenging bosses in Frogmonster, a Metroidvania FPS adventure where you explore a lively world filled with creatures, bugs, and beasts.

name: Pathless Woods
description: Pathless Woods is a sandbox-style game that features exploration, construction, and farming. Travel freely across this land and venture into its mystery. Build a homeland that only existed in your imagination while enjoying productive activities such as farming, logging, hunting and brewing.

name: Musical Range
description: Musical Range is a VR rhythm game where you use firearms to play along to your favorite music! Shoot to the rhythm!

name: Saviorless
description:
"Savior" is the first independent videogame created entirely in Cuba. It is an animated 2D platformer that utilizes timing mechanics and other experimental elements more similar to non-games and other less commercial aspects of videogames.

The story begins when your protagonist, a "Little God," awakes a strange dream to discover that his world is disappearing. From here begins a frantic search through eight levels, where you try at any cost to find the Creator of the Universe, "The Great God," with the sole purpose of saving your home. But on your way, you very soon discover that you are but an character in an unfinished story, and all the reality around you is only a segment of a colossal game is beginning to collapse.

On this idea, that reality is nothing but a fiction, "Savior" creates an experience where the user will be constantly faced with atypical and surprising situations. We wish to give players the most personal and emotional game possible, and every day we’re working hard at the completion of this project.

name: Penguin Attack
description: Sin descripción

name: Skill Test: Online
description: You can create a map yourself and invite other players to check which of you knows best what real driving is. A beautiful and high-quality racing game in which you can upgrade your car driving skills. The game has an online mode, which means that you can drive cars with your friends and with players from all over the world. Compete online and show all your skills!

name: Clash of Clans: Egypt Season
description: This Season, we're off to a sandy and dry adventure in the desert, and only 3-star victories will quench your thirst! Unravel the Pyramids' secrets with this season's Ancient Egypt -themed Hero skins and scenery!

name: Yohane the Parhelion: Numazu in the Mirage - Costume "Trendy Schoolgirl"
description:
The costume "Trendy Schoolgirl" includes the following elements:

- Costume "Trendy Schoolgirl"
This is the cutting edge of Tokai! ?
A costume that draws out a completely different charm from the usual Yohane.
The Lailaps strap on the bag is a charm point!
Let's adventure in the mirror world with Yohane with a different figure than usual!

name: Make That Date!
description: Make That Date! is a VIP-exclusive book of the Make That Date! series.

name: Marth.exe
description: Very short game that takes Fire Emblem: Shadow Dragon and turns it into a corrupt .exe game.

name: Fear Of The Dark
description: A new wintery map that takes place in a spoopy space research center filled with spoop, monsters and space-stuff. Also lots of snow.

name: Sonic Superstars: Retro Diner Amy Costume
description: A Retro Diner Costume for a classic gal.

name: Pikmin: Olimar's Descent
description: Olimar has crashed his ship on an unknown planet during a space voyage! Will he be able to recover his ship parts and escape back into space?

name: Claw Machine
description: Sin descripción

name: Balloon Slider Mania
description: Sin descripción

name: Silver Falls Miracle Makeout Mania
description:
NEW to the Silver Falls series is the first ever Get Drunk And Kiss Your Friends On The Lips Simulator! Exclusive to the Nintendo DS, Silver Falls Makeout Miracle Mania allows players to match up their favorite characters from the Silver Falls series and make them kiss on the lips by closing the Nintendo DS when the timing is right!

Manage your resources wisely! Drawing on the series' roots of Survival Horror, players will have to manage a limited budget to purchase drinks and food. But WATCH OUT! Some character match ups won't like kissing on tbe lips, and doing so would totally ruin the vibe. Use your resources such as drinks and sandwiches to avoid making a dive bar faux pas and making two bad matches make out.

Giving characters drinks will increase their Drunken Level. The higher a character's Drunken Level is, the easier it will be to maintain a good vibe. Drunken characters will earn Romance Points faster!

You will earn a ranking by how well you do before the bar closes. Earn money by attaining a higher RANK. Use the money to buy supplies you need to survive the tense social situation of getting drunk with friends and strangers at a mountain dive bar.

You can earn different Epilogues for A Rank and S Rank, and enjoy a bit more story.

Enjoy this thrilling new chapter in Silver Falls!

Happy April fools, everyone!

name: Drifter
description: Drifter is an immersive, dialogue-driven first person experience with psychedelically dazzling lo-fi environments and effects. Interact via branching dialogue and explore surreal environments in this compacted, narrative-led adventure.

name: Reasons For Kym
description:
Reasons for Kym is a short love
story about giving 7 colorful reasons
to understand and love Kym.

name: Danganronpa Hope Recreation
description: Embark on a thrilling journey filled with deception, despair, and unexpected twists, all in a parallel universe with no connection to the original creators of danganronpa.

name: Seascape Paradiso
description:
Underwater photographer Jay has always had a passion for the ocean. She'd never tell you that she thinks she's seen it all...but she'd have to admit that she never thought she'd meet a real-life mermaid on a dive!

But bubbly and mysterious Echo disappears nearly as soon as Jay meets her. Can the two of them reunite, or will it be a one-time encounter?

name: El Camperillo
description: This game was created for Illojam #1 and to no one's surprise I didn't deliver it on time. This is a cooking simulator where you have to prepare meals for suspiciously well-known customers who enter your establishment. Done in 1 and a half month with Godot 4.2.

name: Tic-Tac-Toe Bolt
description: Tic-Tac-Toe Bolt is an LCD game that contains 3 Tic-Tac-Toe games. The games include Infinite Tic-Tac-Toe, Memory Flash and Cover-up Tic-Tac-Toe.

name: Social Democracy: An Alternate History
description: Play as the Social Democratic Party of Germany in 1928, and try to stop the NSDAP from taking power. Guide the party through elections and parliamentary politics, and deal with the Great Depression and the spiraling political violence that characterized the late "Weimar Republic".

name: You Can Only Turn Left
description: You Can Only Turn Left is a playful exploration of the hypnagogic state between sleeping and wakefulness. Within this liminal space, memories morph into dreams and dreams feather into reality. You, the player have to navigate these hallucinations by choosing how the character creates their sleeping patterns. Inspired by game books and guided sleep meditations, this story invites you to imagine both the mundane and the fantastic to practice the mental flexibility of an avid dreamer.

name: Crime Scene Evidence Cleaner
description:
Crime scene murder mystery is an organized crime story cleaner game, where the desperate need to save your grandma’s life propels you into the murky world of crime murder cleanup games offline 3d. When the Crime city tycoon real gangster Murder mafia calls, it's time to roll up your sleeves and confront the grim realities of the underworld crime case games district 3d.
With the pressure mounting, you must navigate where crimes committed by free Criminal and small-time crooks in different crime zones. As hospital bills loom large and options dwindle, you're left with no murder choice but to utilize your specialized skills. As a crime scene evidence cleaner detective Equipped with various tools, you'll tackle the gruesome task of solving a case, scrubbing away bloodstains, hiding the evidence, disposing of bodies, and erasing any traces of wrongdoing during the crime detective simulator RPG.

name: Paradise Shooting!!
description: A simple shooting game in which players move your ship left and right to destroy all the "targets" placed on the stage! Clear all 12 stages and get a total of 24 reward CGs!

name: Penguin Migrants
description: Sin descripción

name: Sunder For People Who Don't Have Time To Play Sunder
description: Get the full Sunder experience in just a fraction of the time! All of the action, with only 10% of the average monster count! The maps range from a few minutes to 15-20 minutes ﻿long. ﻿Play it now, and next time you're at a party, you'll have just enough Sunder knowledge to impress everyone with your analysis of the combat encounters. ﻿﻿

name: Cosmo Solitaire
description: Sin descripción

name: Bunny Girl Cumming for My Carrot
description: Nothing better than coming home after a long day to your soothing pet rabbit Miyu, WHAT?! Miyu's now a smokin' hot BUNNY GIRL in need of some HEAVY PETTING to be satisfied?!

name: Piece It!
description: A casual jigsaw puzzle experience! Listen to awesome background music and enjoy the relaxing view and sounds of nature at the end of each puzzle!

name: Cars
description: Sin descripción

developers.name: Playables, Mario von Rickenbach, Michael Frei

name: Chuno
description: This is a game where Chuno, a mutated snail, goes on a journey and brings back souvenirs and stuffed animals. A very easy and short 2D action. Menu operations are performed using the mouse. Use only WASD or arrow keys. There is no failure or retry system.

name: Shady Lewd Kart: Wild Woody Character Pack
description: Wild Woody joins Shady Lewd Kart!

name: Metroid Fool
description:
[Dedicated to each and every person who has ever taken this game a bit too seriously]

Re-discover Tallon IV now that most of it's rooms have been filled with perplexing puzzles, jovial japes and even a few sacrilegious stinkers. Do you have what it takes to endure them all?

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Premium Avatar Set: Shadowverse
description: Set Contents: • Premium Avatars: Arisa, Luna, Rowen • Badges: Arisa, Luna, Rowen • Weapon Cutouts: Forest Guardian's Bow, Dragonslayer Spear

name: Ark: Scorched Earth Ascended
description: Stranded naked, parched and starving in a vast desert, even seasoned ARK survivors must use all their skills to stand a chance of survival. Tame, breed, and ride the desert's mysterious new creatures including... DRAGONS!

name: Oops! All Gyarus!
description:
One year after opening Barlow's Books and Bistro, the gang decide to celebrate with a custom concoction of tea and sparkly, glamorous liqueur. Surely, nothing could possibly go wrong. In fact, with Maggie and Portia finally existing in the same timeline, how could things go any way other than totes fab?

The fans have spoken, and we've heard you loud and clear: Mice Tea simply did not contain enough gyarus. This very special April Fools scenario aims to correct that mistake. Jam packed with as much gyaru goodness as we could muster, with guest illustrations from Popcore, blackshirtboy, NotZachForWork, CupcakeCarly, ComicTF, Ayvie, and Cavitees, and guest audio by Raina the Mouse, there's a lot to enjoy.

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Additional Character Vane
description: Set Contents: • Playable character: Vane • Premium Avatar: Vane • Badge: Vane • Weapon Cutout: Treuer Krieger • Figure Studio poses and expressions 1–6 for Vane

name: Ark: Bob's Tall Tales
description: Get ready for Wild West trains, steampunk airships, post-apocalyptic battle-cars and more in Bob's Tall Tales! Discover new story adventure content, new creatures, structures, items, and cosmetics across the ARKs - all brought to life by big-hero Bob (Karl Urban) and Meeka (Auliʻi Cravalho)!

name: Assetto Corsa Competizione: 24H Nürburgring Pack
description: The most anticipated moment for Assetto Corsa Competizione has finally come. Nürburgring 24 hours is in. The huge circuit including a combination of Nürburgring GP and Nordschleife has finally come, together with the worldwide known 24H format. Dive into the world's most beautiful rollercoaster.

name: Doug Huggem
description: You have to make friends and spread positivity as Doug Huggem!

name: Project Canvas: Isekai Joucho Ikusei Keikaku
description: Sin descripción

name: One Piece: Dream Pointer
description: In this three-dimensional vertical screen video game, players can recruit heroes from the One Piece universe and relive moments of the Straw Hat Pirates’ adventures.

name: 0x0
description: 0x0 is a very short, MBF21 mapset that follows the "n by n" texture limitation gimmick, meaning that every map in the wad uses 0 flats and 0 textures.

name: Cazzarion: Gunslinger
description: Sin descripción

name: Content Warning
description: Film your friends doing scary things to become SpöökTube famous!

name: Heaven Stairs
description: Where shadows whispered secrets and moonlight danced with forgotten memories

name: The Zombie Wave
description: 《Zombie》 Wave is a low polygon cartoon style third person shooter game where players need to protect cute cartoon characters from damage, use a variety of weapon choices and strategies, challenge enemies, and engage in thrilling defense battles.

name: 100 Funny Cats: Extra Content
description: By purchasing DLC, you will get extra content in the game 100 Funny Cats. Get an extra level with 100 more adorable cats!

name: I Got Gooned by a Femboy
description: Desperate times call for desperate measures.

name: Break Through
description: Breakthrough is an action game in which you fight giant enemy robots. Equip weapons that fall on six floating bits and destroy the enemy's parts. Enemies can be won by destroying their cores, which are located somewhere on their body. Manipulate the six bits to eliminate all enemies.

name: Cosmic Tankinator
description: Cosmic tankinator is a hard and rapid action 2D fighter game. Blow up your enemies as you wish, with everything from large laser turrets to landmines! Upgrade your tank between each mission and go from starbase to starbase obliterating enemy turrets and tanks!

name: The Russian Roulette Game: PR
description: The classic Russian roulette with friends, With a small twist to bring more chaos and fun to the gameplay.

name: Anzeigenhauptmeister Simulator
description: No exceptions!Make the streets (in)secure as the Master Chief of Criminal Complaints and conquer the leaderboard of the local online watch!

name: Searching
description: A turn-based RPG game where every attack requires skillful timing

name: Atman: Rebel Flame
description: "Atman Rebel Flame" is a cyberpunk card-building game that supports multiplayer battles with no external numerical growth to ensure fairness . Choose your hero and support cards, elevate your phase and select talents, defeat opponents and claim victory!

name: Brass Necessity
description: In this top-down, sci-fi shoot 'em up, you'll have to solve combat-based puzzles in order to escape the cursed undead. You've only got your laser as a weapon and crystals to change its element. You'll need to figure out matchups that work best against enemies to escape. Good luck, you'll need it!

name: Run for the Bus
description: "Run for the Bus" is a 3D third-person she-runner game. A girl who overslept in the morning runs after the bus she missed. Let her build her strength and chase her bus as she eats the bread.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Astronauts
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Astronauts is an puzzel game with cool astronauts in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Opps! They Love Me Way Too Much!
description: You'll immerse yourself in first-person perspective, encountering four boys with diverse personalities and appearances, embarking on various sweet love stories with them. The aloof boss, the gentle neighbor, the adorable coffeeboy, or the platonic friend? Among them, who will be your final choice?

name: Human Milk Seller
description: In the not-so-distant future, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The world lies in ruins, ravaged by nuclear fallout, climate disasters, and corporate greed. But amidst the desolation, there's one last hope for survival: the Lactomans.

name: Bull-Bia Ricky
description: This is a small single-player platformer. Created by one person in a cartoon style, it tells us a short story about a simple guy who, despite the difficulties encountered along the way, achieves his goal.

name: The Noob Adventures: Fool For Love
description: A visual novel set in the world of 'The Noob Adventures'. Meet and talk to your favourite characters in this nostalgic fan-fiction.

name: Find 101 Doomers: Deluxe Content
description:
This DLC Includes:
New level with 101 more doomers
Artworks in high resolution (dark and light themes)

name: Caden's Climb
description: A fast-paced 2D platformer.

name: Exit 13 Gallery Escape
description: Exit 13 Gallery Escape is a psychological horror game where you are trapped in a gallery on the 13th floor of a building. Your only hope is to find the exit and reach the 1st floor, but every time you do, you end up in the same gallery again and again.

name: 100 Funny Cats
description: Join the cutest adventure in the funny locations with Cats! Explore the charming hand-drawn artwork of funny location and cats as you embark on a quest to find 100 adorable cats hidden throughout the game.

name: Find 101 Doomers
description: Find 101 Doomers is the first object search game in which you have to find all the yearning doomers!

name: Dungeons & Cardboard
description: Dungeons & Cardboards is a Tactical RPG / Dungeons Crawler inspired by Role Playing games. Follow the POV of a group of 4 players, against the supreme Cardboard Master, and crush his big bad Boss, by stuffing yourself in his dungeons, populated by dubious enemies, and handmade decorations.

name: I Got Cucked by a Futanari
description: Just because you can't please your wife, doesn't mean she can't be pleased...

name: Mouthole
description: Keep an eye on the time to ensure you make the most of your week in the psychospherical house of MOUTHOLE. Solve puzzles and unravel mysteries to forge convoluted paths of discovery and exploration. Navigate quotidian existence. Crawl into your mouth. Brush your teeth?

name: Anomaly Exit
description:
You were on your way home one day when you realised the train was stopping at the same station over, and over again... at least you thought they were all the same station...

Taking elements from Exit 8 and I'm On Observation Duty, Anomaly Exit fuses the spot-the-difference genre with psychological horror. Additionally, the experience is designed with singleplayer and multiplayer in mind.

name: Sir Fallen
description: A game about a Knight, a Dog, Climbing and Rage Quitting.

name: Finally Free
description: A point & click top-down horror adventure game that takes place in a nightmare

name: The Last Safe Place
description: 1853; Mysterious Civilization Unearthed under Ember Mountain! Anthracite coal miners tell of vast treasures exhumed from a forgotten city, full of mysterious ruins and otherworldly beauty. Join the exhibition as you descend through uncharted caverns to find The Last Safe Place.

name: Asteroid Drift
description: Asteroid Drift is a challenging spaceship piloting arcade game. Success is all about controlling your momentum and inertia. Don't explode, and go faster and faster to earn higher medals.

name: Relationship Anarchy
description: Investigate procedurally generated hidden relationships in a casual mystery game. Explore, find clues, deduce, infer, solve the puzzle, and unravel the true meaning.

name: WhenTaken
description: Look at the photo and try to guess the location and the year when it was taken. Place your pin on the map. Move the slider to select the year or simply type it in. When you’re ready, press the button to make your guess.

name: Evostrike
description: A Roguelike tactics game where you fight hordes of aliens. Your Units evolve and learn new skills as the fight goes on. Manage your squad of 5 specialised mercenaries, and fight a never ending war against the infestation.

name: The book by the blue
description: in this First-person horror game you will be discovering what's going on with missing persons and a corrupt scientist. Find items littered around to access locked doors and secret passages.

name: Tile Perfect
description: Tile Perfect: Unleash your puzzle mastery with Tile Perfect, the mesmerizing sliding puzzle game that bursts with vibrant, pixelated charm!

name: Unspoken
description: You find yourself in the center of inexplicable nightmare. Make your way through the horror, come face to face with terrible events. Immerse yourself in the dark mystery of the events in which you found yourself an unwitting participant.

name: Vectored Armada
description: Build ships, break fleets. No distractions. Design ships without constraint upon your workbench, built out of destructible blocks of all shapes and sizes: hull, weapons, engines. Compose Fleets of your self-architected battle craft and obliterate the armadas of the dictator! THE OPPRESSOR MUST FALL.

name: TD Designer
description: In TD designer, you, as a newbie game designer, are assigned to playtest an reverse tower defense game. Recruit a team of adventurers, collect powerful relics and beat down enemys in various levels. After being more experienced, you'll engage more in the game-dev progess.

name: Inside The Memory
description: [Using Live2D, almost full voice] (Voice is only in Japanese)A mystery that begins with a single invitation received from your uncle.A ``mystery'' that happens to someone who was supposed to be an invited guest. Please try to solve it by yourself.

name: Art of Stunt
description: Art of Stunt is a motorbike game that challenges bike riders on thrilling stunt courses. You can complete some classic action stunts, including falling from the roof of a skyscraper, driving through the glass wall of a building, etc.

name: Earth, Fire, And Wind
description: An open world arpg with elemental martial arts magic. The focuses are exploration, combat, and then platforming. The art is Anime / Ghibli stylized and the music is Japanese modern classical.

name: Perfect Poses
description: Adjust your pose, go through the hole!

name: Tower of Grimoiria
description: Tower of Grimoiria is a unique blend of tower defense and first-person magic casting with roguelike elements. Defend your wizard tower against hordes of fantastical creatures by strategically placing magical turrets and unleashing powerful spells.

name: The Spirit's Destiny
description: Four adventurers are sent to search for the lost spirits and save the world from the evil wizard Zorgal.

name: Nope Challenge
description: Nope Challenge is a VR thrill ride where you tackle spine-tingling phobias - think clowns, spiders and dizzying heights - with a twist. Hit the Nope Button to jump from adrenaline-pumping action to a peaceful Breather Space. It's not just a heart-racing experience for players but also a hilarious spectacle for friends watching. Perfect for a fun, fear-conquering adventure!

name: Fan Pop Rhythm Stage: Aim for the Heart
description: Idol experience in VR! A new type of action casual VR game where you can enjoy shooting x dancing!

name: Quantum Drive
description: Welcome to Quantum Drive! Get ready for the intensity of speed, where the streets are your playground, and speed is your ally.

name: Holy Maid Academy
description: When Ryunosuke Kokuto receives a personal invitation from the chairman of a respected edifice to serve as a professor there, he doesn’t say no to the opportunity.

name: Code Has Price
description: Buy Commands. Make a program. Collect more coins. Repeat.

name: Legend Of Peks: Halloween Horror
description: Welcome to the Haloween Horror DLC Pack!

name: Invaders 360
description: A modern tribute to arcade legends! This shoot'em up arcade game revives the classics after 45 years with fresh graphics and innovative gameplay. Become a part of Space Ranges Inc. Join now! Get the high score!

name: Bring The Chickens Home
description: Find your lost chickens and bring em home in this casual action isometric 3d platformer. Compete against other players best times around the world. Work and fight together in local co-op. Save as many chickens and survive in endless mode.

name: Protocol Delta
description: Protocol Delta is a fast-paced twin-stick arcade game with minimal aesthetics. Test your reflexes as you try to survive relentless waves of geometric enemies.

name: Astra: Knights of Veda
description:
Astra: Knights of Veda is a visually stunning, story-rich, 2D RPG. A dark plague besets the world of Planis, perptrated through a dark ritual performed by the Mad King. You, and the other Knights of Veda, are the only ones who can bring normality back to the world.

Journey through this dark medieval fantasy world. Fatal challenges await in all corners of the world. Endless undead and beasts charge at you in the Nightmare, and difficult bosses wait in their Sealed Prisons. Stand alone and fight these monstrosities, and get rewards to make your Knights of Veda stronger.

As the Master of the Book, it is up to you to utilize the Knights of Veda in the best way possible to confront challenging but well designed bosses and monsters. Each Knight of Veda wields various skills and weapons, so make use of them as best as possible.
You'll be able to journey with up to 4 Knights of Veda in your party, or play co-op mode and explore the challenges ahead together.

name: Roll It to the End
description: Roll It to the End is an addictive puzzle game where the objective is to reach the end by matching the number at the bottom of the dice with the number from the end point. Special platforms will trigger different events. With the builder you can create and share your own levels with other players.

name: I Can See You
description: Step into the shoes of Azuka in this intense third-person survival horror game. You are nothing but prey, and your only goal is to hide and avoid being caught by your pursuer. You must complete puzzles, explore new areas of the house, and uncover the truth behind the situation through a smartphone.

name: Elder Trial
description: Elder Trial is a Rougelike ARPG game with Customizable Abilities,each Ability has a variety of Customizable Enhancement Options,and it can also Super Evolution!The game also has a large number of Weapons,Amulets,Random Events…You can have fun every time you play the game!

name: Let's Pet Pets
description: Pet pets to gain Pet Points. Pet Points purchase Helping Hands. Helping Hands give you Pet Points every second. Each Helping Hand can be upgraded to give you more Pet Points. Pet Points buy Items. Items are unlocked by completing Quests. Items give you effects. Quests let you buy more pets.

name: The Dark Realm
description: The Dark Realm is a roguelike with emphasis on fast-paced gameplay and bullet hell elements. No more boring choices, dialogues and inventory management - just do everything as you go and enjoy the pure action!

name: The Simpsons: Night of the Dolphin!
description:
It's the ultimate battle for Springfield!

Based on the TREEHOUSE OF HORROR episode segment, choose a citizen and duke it out with some deadly dolphins looking to take over the town! Stand your ground against the endless streaming horde of aquatic attackers and push them back to the ocean!

name: Inside Out at The Top of the World
description: A visual novel about awkward conversations and being stuck next to your boss on a gigantic rollercoaster

name: Potion Stand Story
description: Potion Stand Story is a short visual novel/shop simulator, created for the NaNoRenO game jam in 2024.

name: Worldguessr
description: Worldguessr is a geo-based game, in which you must find exactly where you are in the world using Google Street View !

name: Shepherd’s Plan
description: An office point-and-click puzzle game mixed with visual novel-style storytelling set in a noir-fabled world. As you are fired from the job, to save yourself from a collapsing dream, it’s time to investigate, discover the black company’s secrets, and take sweet revenge for the money you deserve.

name: Monochrome Pixels
description: Can you bring back the colors into your life?

name: Dream Gen
description: Build your dreams in this polyrhythm designer. Dream Gen is all about crafting relaxing or chaotic melodies, which can be played out for hours on end.

name: Olympics Go! Paris 2024
description:
Participate in 12 games and build a city around Olympic venues.

Featuring archery, artistic gymnastics, athletics - 100m, basketball, breaking, cycling track, fencing, golf, rowing, shooting - skeet, skateboard - park, and swimming - 100m freestyle.

name: Destroyer 7800
description: You are the anti-submarine warfare officer of a destroyer on patrol somewhere in the South Pacific. The sea below your ship is rife with enemy submarines. Your job is to destroy as many enemy submarines as possible within your 90-second firing window using your ship's main ASW weapon: The depth charge. Your ship can launch up to 4 depth charges at a time. Since depth charges are timed to explode at a pre-determined depth, you must place the aiming line at the depth you wish the charge to explode while gauging the time it will take the charge to reach that depth to explode on an enemy submarine. The aiming line can be moved vertically using the controller. Depth charges are not contact weapons so they will only destroy an enemy submarine upon exploding at the pre-determined depth. You may fire a depth charge by pressing the button on your controller. Your destroyer has two speeds which may be changed using the alternate button on the controller. If you manage to manage to rack up 2500 points or more, your firing window will be extended by 30 seconds.

name: Escape from Somnium
description: Escape From Somnium is a fan-made AI: THE SOMNIUM FILES x Zero Escape crossover fan game, featuring over 5k words and high-resolution, 4K graphics.

name: Zag
description: Zag is a short visual novel made for the Nanoreno 2024! It's about Teddy, a new (half-demonic) student who's supposed to get a school tour. Instead, he somehow ended up at the newspaper club - reading through newspaper clippings with the other members.

name: Era.S Decode
description: Era.S Decode is a Third Person Arena multiplayer game, designed by a eSports pro to bring a fun, fast-paced high fragging experience with fair, balanced mechanics to ensure that the better player & team always win every match. Featuring a Quick Switch multi-gun system, the skill gap is vast for you to grow your pro comp capabilities & display your greater prowess over all who may challenge you!

name: Grit Under the Eyelid
description: Grit Under the Eyelid is recycledoj's first solo release for Quake, for Arcane Dimensions 1.8 Patch 1. This is primarily single player focused, and makes some pretty extensive use of the jump boots for exploration, and includes a lot of platforming as a result.

name: Tower of Minak
description: A semi non-linear loopety loop map. Takes place in a tower in the sky that has a lot of books for some reason.

name: Airtime Media
description: Today is your last day as an employee at Airtime Media. Make your way from Reception to Neighbourhood 16 in Airtime Central, and kill the CEO. You may have to fight misinformation on the way there.

name: Erotic Photoshoot
description: Nancy is secretly in love with her hobby colleague, and one day she gets a chance to win her heart!

name: The Mystery Of Eigengrau
description: An atmospheric horror/escape room game for mobile devices.

name: Hentai Stars: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 31st March, Midnight.
description: 31st March, Midnight. is a short and free visual novel about a game developer who is working on a new spinoff for an up-and-coming studio.

name: Aftertaste
description:
Aftertaste was written for NaNoRenO 2024. Currently, only part of the story has been released; further updates will come shortly until the story is fully complete. Please note that some story parts, artwork, and other assets in this current iteration may change in the future, and it does not reflect the final game.

Warning: Aftertaste contains mature themes which are not suitable for all audiences, which may be distressing to certain readers. Player discretion is advised.

name: Slo's Home
description: Forty seeks revenge by trying to get all the information possible to unmask the real Slo, paying him back in kind. Slo's Home is a game that combines the control of an action game with the control of a point'n click adventure.

name: Escape Qinglong Mountain Re
description: You wake up suddenly and find yourself in a mental hospital, facing numerous severely mentally ill patients, with your life hanging by a thread. Can you escape from here?

name: Neon On!: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Nyakamon Runes
description: Sin descripción

name: UFO Ride
description:
Cross the seas of blue.

Look the free birds fly.

Ride the UFO.

name: Altalite
description: "Altalite" is a kinetic visual novel about a magic user getting kidnapped by a thief — and the lesson it results in!

name: You're Just Imagining It
description:
a chronic illness simulation game.

you think you have a chronic illness, but you don't know what. all you know is you are always in some state of pain. you've been to too many doctors to count... but you still have to live your life.

how long will it take for you to get a diagnosis?

name: Touhou: Fading Illusion - Destitute Chapter
description: The "Destitute Chapter" presents the events of Touhou: Fading Illusion from the perspective of Reimu Hakurei. Join her as she searches for answers to a series of mysterious and tragic events that will forever change her view of the youkai and Gensokyo.

name: Planetka
description: You play as a tiny sentient planet. Maintain your ecosystem, create new plant species and discover the hidden powers inside you. You’ll need them soon, because there is a human spaceship approaching with the intention to mine all your resources and they don’t care if it kills you in the process.

name: Drift Force Xtreme: Ultimate Car Simulator 2024
description: Unleash Your Drift Fury. Become the Champion of Asphalt!

name: OwnTrio: Adventure
description: A game in which the protagonist can multiply himself up to three times, and then reunite them.Self 1 and Self 2 move with the goal of meeting each other.And self 3 manipulates the map to help self 1 and 2 meet.And they manipulate these actions by themselves at the same time!

name: Cats of the Qing Dynasty
description: Embark on a journey through the ancient city of the Qing Dynasty, and search for adorable cats! Experience the delightful collision between cats and historical settings and characters.

name: Haruki's Journey
description: "Harukis Journey" is a challenging jump-and-run adventure for ninja enthusiasts. Are you ready for the challenge?

name: Watch Your Ass
description: The congressman Oleg Mizulin is a staunch homophobe. He proposes a law to ban all gays of all the land. Oleg argues with one of “them” at the parking lot and tells the man about his villainous plans. The lights go out and now the congressman’s ass is in mortal danger.

name: Tomato Flip
description: An athletic game in which you control a tomato to reach the goal pot! Run through to clear all the stages!

name: The Cursor Game
description: Are you ready for the challenge? Guide your cursor through 30 difficult levels. Test your patience and precision in this casual hard game! Share your best times with #THECursorGame and become THE Cursor Master.

name: Oda-hen
description: Sin descripción

name: AX: Portal Slayers
description: AX: Portal Slayers is a free-to-play action PVP third-person FPS game. Set in the realm where reality and fantasy intersect, players defeat monsters to enhance their abilities. Utilize various tactical items to achieve victory in battles against other players.

name: Chicken Boy's Counterattack
description: This is a bullet hell arcade game where you move to dodge bullets, rebound them, and eliminate Xiao Heizi to unlock more chicken boys. Keep fighting back against Xiao Heizi! Come on, show the dignity of Chicken Boy and say no to Xiao Heizi.

name: Irreversible
description: Immerse yourself in a world where darkness comes to life, and monsters inhabit every corner. Your journey is a fight for survival in a forgotten village shrouded in a paranormal nightmare.

name: Eden: A Genesis Through Time
description: A classic Sci-Fi adventure inspired by late 80s computer games. Explore an abandoned spacecraft and uncover the hidden horrors that lie throughout the ship.

name: Sky Journey: Cozy Mornings
description: Find hidden objects from a peaceful post-apocalyptic world while relaxing in the company of a fun little boy and his robot friend!

name: Hero Society
description: Hero Society is an idle RPG game where you are a manager. Gather resources, upgrade buildings, level-up your heroes and defeat the bosses. All without the time consuming burden of RPG games.

name: Toofan AlAqsa
description: A shooter game is about protecting AlAqsa and Palestine . for the support of Palestine .. #FreePalestine

name: Jimmy's Fruity Adventure
description: Mom is out shopping and Jimmy is about to lose his shit.

name: ZiDouQianWen
description: I am a destiny question and answer game based on Zi Wei Dou Shu, a Chinese astrology system. Come and explore the mysteries of destiny with me!

name: Force and Motion
description: Force and Motion is a physics puzzle game where you apply your knowledge of real physics to solve puzzles in the game.

name: Wild Angels: Episode 1
description: An interactive visual novel about a mysterious gang who decided to break the law.

name: House Flipper 2: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Baldur's Gate 3: Deluxe Edition
description:
The multi-award winning RPG Baldur’s Gate 3 released to the mortal plane.
Fill your mantelpiece with feelies while you fill your heart with adventure.
Gather your party and return to the Forgotten Realms in a tale of fellowship and betrayal, sacrifice and survival, and the lure of absolute power. Mysterious abilities are awakening inside you, drawn from a mind flayer parasite planted in your brain. Resist, and turn darkness against itself. Or embrace corruption, and become ultimate evil. Choose from 12 classes and 11 races from the D&D Player's Handbook and create your own identity, or play as an Origin hero with a hand-crafted background. Or tangle with your inner corruption as the Dark Urge, a fully customisable Origin hero with its own unique mechanics and story. Whoever you choose to be, adventure, loot, battle and romance your way across the Forgotten Realms and beyond. Gather your party. Take the adventure online as a party of up to four.

name: Brutalistick VR
description: The golden age of violent flash games now in your VR headset. Fully physics based combat with melee and firearms featuring copious amounts of blood, gore and destruction.

name: Chamberflame
description: Action-roguelite shooter. Each run is different from the last, with unique weapons, upgrade artifacts, enemies, and procedurally generated areas.

name: Top Racer Mini Arcade
description: TopRacer, the SNES classic racing game, was originally released in 1993 with a soundtrack by Barry Leitch. This realistic racer game PIKO Interactive includes 64 racing tracks in 16 countries. The mini arcade features a steering wheel, and the objective is to become the fastest driver in the race with your choice of several cars.

name: Crazy People
description: This is a cartoon shooting.

name: Gotta Bounce
description: An upcoming platformer for the Playdate.

name: Sanabi: Collector's Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Tower of Fire: The Sword of Unspoken Misc
description: Tower of Fire: The Sword of Unspoken Misc is two hour story-heavy adventure game with a strong Power Metal aesthetic.

name: Galactic Blasters D2: Brilliant Supernova
description: Galactic Blasters D2 - Brilliant Supernova is the fifth entry in the horizontal space shooter game series Galactic Blasters.

name: Pawggle
description: Pawggle is a physics puzzle game. Help poor-sighted adorable fur creatures by strategically positioning your pegs and immerse yourself in a joyous furry symphony.

name: Odencat's Paradise Collection
description: A collection made in paradise! Bear's Restaurant and Fishing Paradiso are available to pre-order now in Odencat's Paradise Collection.

name: The Girl Who Kicked a Rabbit
description: The Girl Who Kicked a Rabbit is a tight, turn-based JRPG-lite for those who want just the meaty part. Kill cute enemies, collect loot, and build devastating new spells. Then do it all over again.

name: Atlas Endgames
description: Squad up and embark on a quest to become the ultimate champion of the Atlas Endgames, a tournament where ruthless heroes from across the galaxy fight to pursue fortune, glory, or a burning desire for revenge.

name: Paradise Killer: Collector's Edition
description:
Paradise Killer: Collector's Edition includes:
- Physical copy of the game
- Lenticular Art Card
- Vinyl Sticker Sheet
- Soundtrack Download Card
- Padded Mousepad Featuring Crimson Acid
- Acrylic Charm Featuring Shinji
- 5 Acrylic Character Standees
- Collector's Edition Box

name: Magic Boutique of Royal Blue
description: Help Philosia the Spider Witch in debt to run a magical boutique! You can craft special clothing by exploring the world and collecting mysterious ingredients. Earn money by completing missions and decorate the boutique!✨

name: Kiss/Off
description: Kiss/OFF is an action-packed visual novel game about a bizarre intergalactic dating show. Pick your partner and compete in front of a live studio audience to have the Best Kiss by the end of three dates. The cost of failure? DEATH. Ready, set, smooch!

name: Ages of Cataria
description: Care for generations of townsfolk in a land of mystique and wonder. Build colonies along side your friends in this multiplayer colony sim and narrative RPG.

name: Cursebound
description: Use anything you can find to escape with your life, go alone or bring friends.

name: Hitori Kakurenbo Online
description: Assymetrical multiplayer horror based on the viral Hitori Kakurenbo japanese ritual, you will play as the evil Doll or the stupid survivor teenagers that prepared the ritual in quick fun replayable games.

name: Nightmare: The Lunatic
description: Nightmare: The Lunatic is an action roguelite platformer game where you escape your nightmare. Swap between 3 weapons constantly, use special attacks, and dodge and dodge enemy attacks. Strengthen yourself by collecting powerful and distinctive totems.

name: Sandwalkers
description: Sandwalkers is a roguelike turn-based exploration game. Build your team, traverse varied hostile environments, face countless dangers, and gain knowledge that will help you find and resurrect the Mother Tree Umama.

name: Faraway Fairway
description:
Faraway Fairway is arcade golf game that is procedurally generated and you'll never play the same game twice! Explore and interact as you make your way to the goal and uncover secrets as you progress and complete your photo album!

As a mental health golf game, Faraway Fairway game is designed to be a relaxing pick up and play. Taking care of your mental health should be like a vacation that never ends.

name: Lost Viking: Kingdom of Women
description: While traveling to the East the Vikings fall into a trap. Ragnald is saved by the accompanying wolf and must find his loved ones. The Viking and his companion are forced not only to survive, but properly manage time, space and energy to achieve the goal.

name: Super Mario and the Treacherous Tower
description:
Originally made for the "SimpleFlips' Slide Hack Competition (2024)", "Super Mario and the Treacherous Tower" is a Rom Hack by MrComit the creator of "Super Mario and the Monstrous Manor".

In this Hack, Mario is tasked by Princess Peach to investigate a haunted tower in the middle of nowhere, which is the source for paranormal activities in the Mushroom Kingdom.
Now, Mario has to slide down each floor of the tower to track down the paranormal activity.

name: There's an Only One Way Exit.
description:
Dream is kindly illusion. Find the way to wake up, find the truth beneath the fog.

An interactive RPG game that you is someone who struck in the dream place, find the way to exit, true or lie this is no fault, it only meet the end.

name: Kitty Keep
description: Journey to the beach for a cat-filled offline tower defense (TD) adventure! Strategize with cute cat heroes, growing your castle to thwart invaders.

name: Enforced Entropy
description: Spacebike's first quake map is a large but linear id1 tech base featuring a decent balance of both regular encounters and horde encounters. It has a high monster count and may be quite tough.

name: Throne of Belial
description: This small debut Quake map offers an intense and immersive experience within a dark and ominous environment. Players will journey through a perilous dungeon teeming with lava, metal, and stone structures, along with eerie torch-lit corridors. The ominous glow of lava running along the border of the level and the subtle smoke enhance the atmosphere, casting haunting shadows across the desolate hallways.

name: Bungee Run
description: Can you survive the bungee run?

name: Resource Recon
description: RESOURCE RECON is an exciting game in which you take on the role of a brave miner on a quest to find rare materials in the depths of the earth.Your main goal is to collect valuable resources and minerals that can only be found in the most dangerous and exciting places underground.

name: Astro Miner: Cave Adventure
description: Embark on a Colorful Journey Through the Galaxy! Explore new planets and mine various minerals using your vacuum gun!

name: Dentist Bling: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Minsho
description: Fight and compete with your friends against ruthless and difficult enemies, create a strategy, level up and participate in our exclusive events.

name: Thrice Doomed
description: 27 100% vanilla-compatible maps for Doom I, replacing the three original episodes. Focus is on short, compact maps with a low to moderate difficulty curve; a secondary aim being more consistent visuals within episodes.

name: Faceless
description: Trust your intuition and face your fears. But don't face that man. Things done cannot be undone.

name: Elf Kicker: Level Pack (10 Levels)
description: 10 more levels of Elf Kicker featuring a new enemy and new obstacles.

name: Mushrush
description: Embark on a whimsical journey as a humanoid mushroom in this platformer adventure. Traverse through floating islands, giant trees, caves and lakes to befriend a group of fungal friends that can all grow together.

name: No Bugs On My Windshield
description: Don't let them touch your windshield!

name: MoonWhite
description: Moon White is a short and easy action game featuring Chinese Kungfu. It tells about a journey how two elves compete with each other, looking for the harmony of traditional dance in each movement and posture.

name: Gumbowl's Adventure
description: You play as the main character Gumbowl and have to get your missing gumballs.

name: Take a Look
description: "Let's scold the troublemaker butlers!" Go on an adventure where you have to become a cat agent and get rid of the butlers.

name: Cubint
description: Cubint is a shooter roguelite where you go against a horde of enemies. Use Ally Shooting Turrets to your advantage. Upgrade different Buffs and unlock various Synergies to get stronger. Get powerful Spells that enable tons of new builds.

name: Nixxsz Maids Blazing
description: Nixxsz Maids Blazing is a very simple and small score-attack arena "slasher" set in a Dark Castle. Choose a maid, master her habilities and cut in half all enemies! Cut. Slash. Repeat!

name: Labyrinthia Nightmares: The Journey of Little Fluffypuff
description: Unleash your courage in this epic adventure. Explore, solve, conquer the labyrinth's challenges.

name: Guidelines for the Book of Changes
description: "Guidelines for the Book of Changes" is a guidance game based on the "Book of Changes" philosophy. It interprets your inner world through divination, guiding you forward with wisdom and courage, not fate. Find inner balance, strength, and your life's beacon here.

name: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dinosaurs
description: OG Puzzlers: Synthwave Dinosaurs is an puzzel game with cool dinosaurs in an stunning synthwave style. You have to assemble a single image from random generated indivdual pieces. Combine all of the smart singel frames into one big image and unlock the next level.

name: Destiny Online
description: Destiny Online is a 2D Fantasy MMORPG and offers free-to-play access. Pet System: Capture monsters, make them pets, and have them aid you in combat. Character Dressing up System: Freely DIY your favorite style with hairstyles, headwear, clothes, back accessories, and tails.

name: Inline: Out of Time
description: Complete your delivery routes as fast as possible to appease your corporate overlord while still finding time to enjoy the sights of the retro-futuristic city and your banging tunes.

name: ActionHacker
description: "ActionHacker" is a casual sneak-action game in which you control the main character, an electric man, and aim for the deepest level. Take control of the main character "Elec", an electric man, and sneak through numerous gimmicks. Be the first to reach the deepest part!

name: Annoy This Guy
description: Annoy this guys time in this comedic piece of interactive fiction.

name: Timeworks
description: Timeworks is a time-traveling 3D puzzle platformer with a bouncy cartoon style. Work along past versions of yourself to solve puzzles, create unique Items, and fill out your quotas for your mysterious employers.

name: How Little We Wait
description: In this classic point-and-click adventure you will collect and combine items scattered around an otherworldly room you find yourself trapped in. You only have one minute to escape before the man counts down to zero and the room resets itself.

name: CelV Run
description: CelV Run is the ultimate multiplayer 1v1 race while the floor is lava. In CelV Run you can challenge any of your friends, or you can challenge a player from anywhere in the world. To win just don't fall into the lava and pass through the platforms as quickly as possible.

name: A Liminal Place Remaster
description:
Hello, wanderer.

You somehow got to this weird place, now, you have to get out! Simple, right? Of course not. If you lose your sanity and get distracted by some beautiful landscape... Ah, your days are numbered. Find the exit, and preferably be alive.
Explore a Lonely World, Alone. Or with Unpleasant Company.

ALP makes the world of Backrooms more solitary, and a little relaxing.
